Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: I can resist everything except temptation.

Author: Steven Wright
Quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.

Author: George Carlin
Quote: I put a dollar in one of those change machines. Nothing changed.

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens.

Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I'm good at everything.

Author: Yogi Berra
Quote: Always go to other people's funerals, otherwise they won't come to yours.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the heck she is.

Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote: I told my wife the truth. I told her I was seeing a psychiatrist. Then she told me the truth: that she was seeing a psychiatrist, two plumbers, and a bartender.

Author: Will Rogers
Quote: I don't make jokes. I just watch the government and report the facts.

Author: Groucho Marx
Quote: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog, it's too dark to read.

Author: Mae West
Quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

Author: W.C. Fields
Quote: I am free of all prejudice. I hate everyone equally.

Author: Dorothy Parker
Quote: I don't care what is written about me so long as it isn't true.

Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.

Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.

Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote: Housework can't kill you, but why take a chance?

Author: Steve Martin
Quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.

Author: Henny Youngman
Quote: If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.

Author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
Quote: I'm a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man I keep his house.

Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote: I'm not a morning person. I'm barely a person.

Author: Milton Berle
Quote: Laughter is an instant vacation.

Author: Dave Barry
Quote: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business.

Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote: Reality is the leading cause of stress among those in touch with it.

Author: Robin Williams
Quote: I think the saddest people always try their hardest to make people happy.

Author: Jonathan Winters
Quote: If God had really intended man to fly, he’d make it easier to get to the airport.

Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.

Author: Robert Benchley
Quote: There are two kinds of people in the world, those who believe there are two kinds of people in the world and those who don't.

Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote: The most remarkable thing about my mother is that for thirty years she served the family nothing but leftovers. The original meal has never been found.

Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote: Think before you speak. Read before you think.

Author: Bill Murray
Quote: I don't trust people who don't laugh.

Author: Johnny Carson
Quote: If life was fair, Elvis would be alive and all the impersonators would be dead.

Author: Jack Handey
Quote: I hope life isn't a big joke, because I don't get it.

Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.

Author: Mel Brooks
Quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.

Author: Jerry Lewis
Quote: People hate me because I am a multifaceted, talented, wealthy, internationally famous genius.

Author: Bob Hope
Quote: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance - waiting for the bathroom.

Author: David Letterman
Quote: There's no business like show business, but there are several businesses like accounting.

Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote: Thanksgiving, man. Not a good day to be my pants.

Author: Joan Rivers
Quote: Don't tell your kids you had an easy birth or they won't respect you. For years I used to wake up my daughter and say, 'Melissa, you ripped me to shreds. Now go back to sleep.'

Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote: I'm not a fan of the facts.

Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote: My relationship with my mother is like a dating relationship where we don't speak every day.

Author: Nora Ephron
Quote: When your children are teenagers, it's important to have a dog so that someone in the house is happy to see you.

Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote: I'm not going to vacuum until Sears makes one you can ride on.

Author: Chris Rock
Quote: Wealth is not about having a lot of money; it's about having a lot of options.

Author: Margaret Cho
Quote: My therapist says I can't fix anyone. I should focus on how I handle others' crazy - so I'm writing a book on my crazy.

Author: George Burns
Quote: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.

Author: Ellen Page
Quote: I'm a very lucky, out-of-bounds girl.

Author: Richard Pryor
Quote: There's a thin line between to laugh with and to laugh at.

Author: Bette Midler
Quote: I firmly believe that with the right footwear one can rule the world.

Author: Paul Lynde
Quote: I just think of myself as a comedian who happens to be gay.

Author: Tina Fey
Quote: Some people say, 'Never let them see you cry.' I say, if you're so mad you could just cry, then cry. It terrifies everyone.

Author: Jimmy Kimmel
Quote: I want to be the voice of reason but the voice of humor.

Author: Tim Conway
Quote: I spend a lot of my time holding the refrigerator door open, looking for answers.

Author: Andy Rooney
Quote: I've learned... that just one person saying to me, 'You've made my day!' makes my day.

Author: Colleen Ballinger
Quote: Be yourself, because no one's better at it than you are.

Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote: Feminism is doomed to failure because it is based on an attempt to repeal and restructure human nature.

Author: Art Buchwald
Quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.

Author: Rita Rudner
Quote: I love being married. It’s so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.

Author: Robin Williams
Quote: People say satire is dead. It's not dead; it's alive and living in the White House.

Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote: I haven't slept for ten days, because that would be too long.

Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote: I'm covered in bees!

Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote: The road to success is always under construction.

Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote: A bookstore is one of the only pieces of evidence we have that people are still thinking.

Author: Louis C.K.
Quote: No matter how many improvements there are in technology, people will always look down on a man on a horse.

Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote: Ever wonder what people got Jesus for Christmas? It's like, 'Oh great, socks.'

Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote: My cooking is so bad my kids thought Thanksgiving was to commemorate Pearl Harbor.

Author: Billy Connolly
Quote: Never trust a man who, when left alone in a room with a tea cozy, doesn't try it on.

Author: Milton Berle
Quote: A committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: Follow your passion. Stay true to yourself. Never follow someone else’s path unless you’re in the woods and you’re lost and you see a path. By all means, you should follow that.

Author: Ricky Gervais
Quote: If you can lie, people will believe it more than if you tell the truth.

Author: Will Ferrell
Quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow internet to see who they really are.

Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.

Author: David Sedaris
Quote: If you aren’t cute, you may as well be clever.

Author: Steve Martin
Quote: Some people have a way with words, and other people...oh, uh, not have way.

Author: Bill Maher
Quote: I have never made but one prayer to God, a very short one: 'Oh Lord, make my enemies ridiculous.' And God granted it.

Author: Chelsea Peretti
Quote: Being happy for friends' success and finding happiness in other people's success is an art form.

Author: Stephen Wright
Quote: When everything is coming your way, you're in the wrong lane.

Author: Truman Capote
Quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.

Author: Groucho Marx
Quote: I never forget a face, but in your case, I’ll be glad to make an exception.

Author: Andy Borowitz
Quote: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.

Author: Les Dawson
Quote: I can always tell when the mother-in-law’s coming to stay; the mice throw themselves on the traps.

Author: Steve Martin
Quote: Talking about music is like dancing about architecture.

Author: Paula Poundstone
Quote: The problem with cats is that they get the same look on their face whether they see a moth or an axe-murderer.

Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote: I didn't say I wanted to meet 'em. I just said I'd like to see them somewhere in the building.

Author: Peter Kay
Quote: Do you ever get halfway through eating a horse and go, 'You know, I’m not as hungry as I thought I was.'

Author: Will Rogers
Quote: I don't know jokes; I just watch the government and report the facts.

Author: Brian Regan
Quote: I saw a lady with a flower tattoo on her shoulder and thought it was real, so I smelled it.

Author: Don Rickles
Quote: I never thought that one day I’d be considered a snob; and I’m not.

Author: Jim Jefferies
Quote: We're all going to die, all of us; what a circus! That alone should make us love each other, but it doesn't.

Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote: If we can send one man to the moon, why can't we send them all?

Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote: It's a terrible thing, I think, in life to wait until you're ready. I have this feeling now that actually no one is ever ready to do anything.

Author: Louis C.K.
Quote: It's hard to ruin a friendship with a best friend; it’s your fault if it happens.

Author: Jay Leno
Quote: You cannot be mad at somebody who makes you laugh.

Author: Betty White
Quote: Facebook just sounds like a drag, in my day seeing pictures of people's vacations was considered a punishment.

Author: Chris Rock
Quote: I love my parents, but that doesn't mean I'm like them.

Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote: A lot of people think that fame is very compatible with normalcy. I do not.

Author: Margaret Cho
Quote: It's so amazing to have your own words come back to you.

Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote: I have a huge heart and mind full of mistakes.

Author: James Acaster
Quote: Apathy is the enemy; excitement is the goal.

Author: Brian Regan
Quote: I don't really have hobbies. I watch TV and eat cheese.

Author: Jo Koy
Quote: My mom thinks she has all the answers, just like Siri.

Author: Nate Bargatze
Quote: I believe in ghosts but also that they are always up to no good.

Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote: I never go out of my way to be funny; the world does the hard work for me.

Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote: Every time I'm out in public, people just assume I'm buying something for someone else.

Author: Dane Cook
Quote: I don't make jokes. I just watch the government and report the facts.

Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote: I'm interested in reality, but not that much.
